00028 #ifndef WELIKYOSTERFORCE_HPP_
00029 #define WELIKYOSTERFORCE_HPP_

00031 
00032 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00033 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00034 
00035 #include "AbstractForce.hpp"
00036 #include "VertexBasedCellPopulation.hpp"
00037 
00038 
00047 template<unsigned DIM>
00048 class WelikyOsterForce  : public AbstractForce<DIM>
00049 {
00050 friend class TestForces;
00051 
00052 private:
00053 
00057     double mWelikyOsterAreaParameter;
00058 
00062     double mWelikyOsterPerimeterParameter;
00063 
00064     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00065     template<class Archive>
00066     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00067     {
00068         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00069         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00070         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractForce<DIM> >(*this);
00071         archive & mWelikyOsterAreaParameter;
00072         archive & mWelikyOsterPerimeterParameter;
00073     }
00074 
00075 public:
00076 
00077 
00078 
00082     WelikyOsterForce();
00083 
00087     ~WelikyOsterForce();
00088 
00098     void AddForceContribution(std::vector<c_vector<double, DIM> >& rForces,
00099                               AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00100 
00104     double GetWelikyOsterAreaParameter();
00105 
00109     double GetWelikyOsterPerimeterParameter();
00110 
00116     void SetWelikyOsterAreaParameter(double welikyOsterAreaParameter);
00117 
00123     void SetWelikyOsterPerimeterParameter(double welikyOsterPerimeterParameter);
00124 
00130     void OutputForceParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00131 };
